meaningMnemonic: This word is pretty straightforward. You have <kanji>fur</kanji> and <kanji>skin</kanji>, making a word meaning <vocabulary>fur</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>pelt</vocabulary>, like the kind that can be used to make garments.
readingMnemonic: This is a special case because both kanji use kun'yomi readings in this word. Luckily, you already know the kun'yomi reading from learning the vocabulary 毛 and 皮 previously. Just be careful with the rendaku on the second kanji, 皮.
